title: JSON schema for NPM package @mora/tinypng config file

resize.description: WxH  Resize the output GIF to WxH

resizeWidth.description: Resize to width W and proportional height

resizeHeight.description: Resize to height H and proportional width

resizeFit.description: WxH  Resize if necessary to fit within WxH

scale.description: XFACTOR[xYFACTOR]  Scale the output GIF by XFACTORxYFACTOR

cropTransparency.description: Crop transparent borders off the image

copy.description: Copy how much markers from source file

optimize.description: Optimize Huffman table (smaller file, but slow compression)

crop.description: WxH+X+Y  Crop to a rectangular subarea

perfect.description: Fail if there is non-transformable edge blocks

quality.description: 0-100  Set maximum image quality factor (disables lossless optimization mode, which is by default on)

max.description: 0-100  Set maximum image quality factor (disables lossless optimization mode, which is by default on)

size.description: Try to optimize file to given size (disables lossless optimization mode). Target size is specified either in kilo bytes (1 - n) or as percentage (1% - 99%)

stripAll.description: strip all markers from output file

stripCom.description: strip Comment markers from output file

stripExif.description: strip Exif markers from output file

stripIptc.description: strip IPTC/Photoshop (APP13) markers from output file

stripIcc.description: strip ICC profile markers from output file

stripXmp.description: strip XMP markers markers from output file

allProgressive.description: force all output files to be progressive

allNormal.description: force all output files to be non-progressive

progressive.description: Create progressive JPEG file (enabled by default)

baseline.description: Create baseline JPEG file (disable progressive coding)

quality.description: Visual quality to aim for, expressed as a JPEG quality value

memlimit.description: Memory limit in MB. Guetzli will fail if unable to stay under the limit. Default is 6000 MB

blacken.description: zero samples underlying fully-transparent pixels.  Changing the color samples to zero can improve the compressibility. Since this is a lossy operation, blackening is off by default.

brute.description: use brute-force: try 148 different methods.  Very time-consuming and generally not worthwhile. You can restrict this option to certain filter types, compression levels, or strategies by following it with '-f filter', '-l level', or '-z strategy'.

force.description: write output even if IDAT is larger

reduce.description: do lossless color-type or bit-depth reduction.  (if possible). Also reduces palette length if possible. Currently only attempts to reduce the bit depth from 16 to 8. Reduces all-gray RGB or RGBA image to gray or gray-alpha. Reduces all-opaque RGBA or GA image to RGB or grayscale.

f.description: PNG delta filters (0-5).  filter to use with the method specified in the preceding '-m method' or '-brute' argument. 0: none; 1-4: use specified filter; 5: adaptive

m.description: method [1 through 150].  pngcrush method to try.  Can be repeated as in '-m 1 -m 4 -m 7'. This can be useful if pngcrush runs out of memory when it tries methods 2, 3, 5, 6, 8, 9, or 10 which use filtering and are memory-intensive.  Methods 1, 4, and 7 use no filtering; methods 11 and up use a specified filter, compression level, and strategy.

fix.description: salvage PNG with otherwise fatal conditions

huffman.description: use only zlib strategy 2, Huffman-only.  Fast, but almost never very effective except for certain rare image types

quality.description: min-max  don't save below min, use fewer colors below max (0-100)

posterize.description: output lower-precision color (e.g. for ARGB4444 output)

m.description: compress more: use more iterations (depending on file size)

lossyTransparent.description: remove colors behind alpha channel 0. No visual difference, removes hidden information.

cacheDir.description: 缓存 tinypng 处理后的文件，避免重复处理，节省 api 调用次数

recordFile.description: 记录文件，记录 token 使用或过期情况，给系统用的，对用户无意义，推建设置
